title: MARRIAGE
description: Marriage is a formal union between individuals, typically recognized by law or cultural norms. It often involves a commitment to mutual support, love, and shared responsibilities.

title: BIRTHDAY
description: Birthdays mark the anniversary of a person's birth, celebrated annually. They are often a time for reflection, gratitude, and celebration with family and friends.

title: EXHIBITION
description: An exhibition is a public display of items, artworks, or products, typically organized around a specific theme or topic. It can take place in venues like galleries, museums.

title: GATHERINGS
description: A get-together is an informal gathering of friends, family, or colleagues for socializing and enjoying each other's company.
